Text: Nice upload. I didn't need it, but I asked because you had Death of a Universe in that torrent and I assumed all the Gru stuff was included as well.
Thanks! If you happen to have the Mark Gruenwald written limited series you should post. That series is the pivotal and essential Squadron Supreme story. Glad to see Hyperion in the Avengers.
marvelnerd76, I might upload it during this week.
